channel.title: Need allot of help!
channel.description:
ok i have a few things id like help wth. im using testscape now and i dont no wer to add global objects.. fedexers guide is hella confusing and nonone will tell me other then his guide.
also how do i make commands for testscape?
and lastly whn ever i level up in a stat it says like lets say i just got my 70 str to 77 str. it will say 70/77 untill i level up.. :S how i fix?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 08:38:56 AM[/size][hr]new thing i need help with now so look at bottom

item.title: Need allot of help!
item.dc:creator: @X_bloodsport_X X~ bloodsport ~X
item.description:
@X_bloodsport_X wrote:

yea like what kupo said a telecommand wud look like this:

[code] }
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMANDNAMEHERE”))

{
	justleftbarrows = 1;
	teleportToX = 3035;
	teleportToY = 3699;
	heightLevel = 0;
	sendMessage("Welcome To W/E");[/code]

a spawn command would be:

else if (command.startsWith("SPAWNCOMMANDHERE")) { addItem(ITEMIDHERE, 1);
hope this helps + hope i copied the code right =] sum1 correct me if abits wrong

Read full topic
